page.title: 15EDUCATION PRIMARY LIAISON
page.content: We are eleven and in our last week at primary school.Today our class visited the comprehensive school we will go to in September.It is called the Castle School. At 8.55 we met in the main hall, feeling very nervous.We were told which houses we were in.After going to our form room for registration we were shown around the school.It is about four times as big as the one we go to now and holds 900 children.Instead of one teacher we will have a different teacher for each subject and a different classroom for each lesson.We saw slides and science experiments and we had to say "please" and "thank you" in French before we had a drink and biscuit.At lunchtime we could choose our own meal in the cafeteria.Later we had a discussion in our form_room.By the end of the day we felt reassured.
